title: Genju no Seiza, Volume 1
description: From the Creator of Pet Shop of Horrors  and Kamen Tantei!  Kamishina has never really felt like a normal boy. At school, he prefers to lay low and not interact with the other kids. But all that changes when Kamishina discovers that he is the reincarnated spiritual ruler of the little-known country of Dhalashar. And on top of that, he has an intense spiritual sense that allows him to hear voices from beyond the grave, see visions, and soothe ghosts in their time of need. Living a normal life will just have to wait!
author: Matsuri Akino
